oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: The George Morgan Show - 1950-12-01 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: 1950-12-01 broadcast of The George Morgan Show, part 1. Featuring Grant Turner, The Jordanaires, Hank Garland, Tommy Jackson and Tony Lane (steel guitar), with guests Lonzo & Oscar. Part 2: http://cmfdigitization.cmf.int:2011/cdm/ref/collection/musicaudio/id/451
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: George Morgan; Jordanaires; Lonzo & Oscar; Hank Garland
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Opening statement (Grant Turner) -- Theme -- Up On Santa Claus Mountain (George Morgan) -- George Morgan and Grant Turner talk -- I Love No One But You (George Morgan) -- George Morgan and the Jordanaires talk -- Shadrack (The Jordanaires) -- George Morgan introduces Lonzo & Oscar -- Onions Onions (Lonzo & Oscar) -- South (Hank Garland)
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: George Morgan show (Radio program); Morgan, George, 1925-1975; Turner, Grant; Jordanaires (Musical group); Lonzo and Oscar; Garland, Hank, 1930-2004; Jackson, Tommy
